Title: Dex Takes a Holiday
Plot: Dexter gets some much-needed R&R time with Rita and the kids out of town, leading to his stalking of a new victim until he unexpectedly begins to empathize with his target, a cop that murdered her family.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Courtney Ford, David Ramsey, Christina Cox, James MacPherson
